review: Dr Rinky Tandon is a very thorough doctor. She does assessment of the children herself and that first step makes all the difference.  Compared to other doctors, she came to exactly the same conclusion regarding our child as we had come to. She also had a very dedicated team to do various therapies.  The clinic also has a nice ambience. Together they have improved by childs developmental issues greatly. We value the support we have got from them.

She is an amazing doctor with a very soft heart and deep knowledge.The most important aspect of any doctor is to understand the psyche of the patient and she gives ample time for thatâ€¦ Very SatisfiedðŸ˜Š

It was a great session with Dr Rinky Tandon and we got lot of small insights on the behavioural patterns that how to behave with children. She made us very comfortable both parent and child and let us know how to react in future situations. Looking forward for more such counselling sessions.
